snippet: Shmuel Rabinowitz said he would not oppose a proposal to create a new area of prayer for Jews wishing to worship in a less traditional, more egalitarian style.
abstract: Shmuel Rabinowitz, Orthodox rabbi of Western Wall in Jerusalem, says he will not oppose proposal to create new area of prayer for Jews wishing to worship in less traditional, more egalitarian style.
lead_paragraph: Shmuel Rabinowitz said he would not oppose a proposal to create a new area of prayer for Jews wishing to worship in a less traditional, more egalitarian style.

headline.seo: Rabbi Says He Won’t Fight Plan on Western Wall
headline.main: Israel: Rabbi Says He Won’t Fight Plan on Western Wall
headline.print_headline: Israel: Rabbi Accepts Plan for Change at Western Wall
